title: [Psychology] Skepticism has a negative relationship with belief in COVID-19 conspiracy theories; belief in CTs about COVID-19 was found to be significantly and positively correlated with Machiavellianism, narcissism and psychopathy

[Health] People who ate a plant-based diet had a 73% lower chance of moderate-to-severe Covid, while pescatarians had a 59% lower chance, and those on a low-carbohydrate high-protein diet had a 48% greater chance of moderate-to-severe Covid
